<!-- CHANGE THE PATHS AFTER href AND src TO THE LOCATION OF THE CSS FILE FOR THIS TOOL -->
            <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/sacdou-cityworks-qa-plugin/css/eec-qa.css" />
            <script src="/sacdou-cityworks-qa-plugin/js/eec-qa.js"></script>
            <script src="/sacdou-cityworks-qa-plugin/js/eec-qa-wo.js"></script>

            <!-- CHANGE THE TOOL'S PARAMETERS BELOW AS INDICATED IN THE COMMENTS -->
            <script type="text/javascript">
              var qaParams = {
                application: "/cityworks_demo",  // Replace this with the path to your Cityworks instance (with no trailing "/" or "Default.aspx")
                credentials: {
                  LoginName: "qa",  // Replace this with a proxy login for the QA plugin.
                  Password: "qa"    // Replace this with the password for the proxy login.
                },
                selector: "#eec-qa-tests"  // Replace this with a selector to the DOM location where the tests should be injected.
              };
              eecQaPlugin.init(qaParams);
            </script>
